page.title: 02FURTHER EDUCATION ...
page.content: {Further Education in Rotherham The College opened in September 1981 following the merger of existing further education establishments, the intention being to provide a comprehensive and flexible and integrated educational service for the areas post school population. It aims to help students gain qualifications and experience within their chosen fields and to provide non-vocational courses. It accepts all students residing in the borough from the age of 16 - 19 years. The college is open from 8.30 a.m. to 9.30 p.m. each weekday. There is a wide range of full and part-time courses covering seven departmental areas. Business studies, creative studies, general education, mechanical engineering and building, mining and electrical engineering, science and materials etc.
